messages.zh: 你选择现在与我通讯，是不是意味着，你已经成功把他们引了出来？
messages.en: You deciding to contact me now, does this mean, that you have successfully lured them out?

messages.zh: 至少，特别督查组是安全的。
messages.en: At least, the Special Inspection Division is safe.

messages.zh: 对整个计划依然一无所知。
messages.en: Still know nothing about the whole plan.

messages.zh: 魏大人。目前看来，你的策略除了给龙门造成了巨大损失之外，还没有任何成效。
messages.en: Executive way. So far, your strategy hasn’t had any effects besides bringing great losses to Lungmen.

messages.zh: 不必强压火气。我能理解你对计划的不满。
messages.en: No need to force down your anger. I can understand your resents to the plan.

messages.zh: 我的愤怒不是针对计划的，而是针对你的。为了胜利，难道就可以不顾一切吗？
messages.en: My anger is not against the plan, but against you. For victory, can we really put everything else aside?

messages.zh: 陈警官，很可惜，我们是同一种人。
messages.en: Officer Ch’en, the unfortunate thing is, we are the same kind of people.
Please remember, we don’t have other choices.

messages.zh: 摆在我们面前的不是胜利和另一种卑微的胜利——
messages.en: What’s placed before us are not victory and a less honorable victory——

messages.zh: 而是惨痛的胜利或可悲的毁灭。
messages.en: But a bitter victory or pitiable destruction.

messages.zh: 在被迫受伤之时不肯留血，只会在捕猎时被猎物撕破喉咙。
messages.en: Refusing to shed blood when you’re bound to get hurt, will only get your throat ripped out by the prey in a hunt.

messages.zh: 赌徒有后路，却被贪婪冲昏头脑；棋手有胜负，无法赢得战争就只能招致惨败。
messages.en: Gamblers have their ways of escape, but are carried away by greed; Chess players have only victory and defeat, it’s either a triumph or a miserable failure.

messages.zh: 就让每一颗棋子都发挥他们应有的作用吧。
messages.en: Let every piece play their fitting roles.

messages.zh: 希望你能履行，你的诺言。
messages.en: I hope, that you can live up to your promise.
